CustomField.description: The value used to get the selling quantity back to the pricing quantity. E.g. Pricing in Tonnes, selling 25kg bags, this would be 0.025. Pricing is caluclated Sellining Qty * Contract Price * [this value]
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The value used to get the selling quantity back to the pricing quantity. E.g. Pricing in Tonnes, selling 25kg bags, this would be 0.025. Pricing is caluclated Sellining Qty * Contract Price * [this value]
CustomField.label: Item Pricing Weight
